channel.title: Comments on: Boys are strong, Rabbits can jump
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Michelle Allerdice
item.description:
I also scroll down to the bottom of the new blogs to see how long they are. Although, instead of deciding how many sessions it will take to read them, I try to figure out when I will have time to sit and read the entire thing at once.
Sorry it didn't work out with Jane, but glad you had a great time dating her.
Thanks for making my Saturday morning awesome with your new blog!
item.content:encoded:
I also scroll down to the bottom of the new blogs to see how long they are. Although, instead of deciding how many sessions it will take to read them, I try to figure out when I will have time to sit and read the entire thing at once.

Sorry it didn’t work out with Jane, but glad you had a great time dating her.

Thanks for making my Saturday morning awesome with your new blog!

item.title: by: Vanessa
item.description: Oops, I totally commented on this after a different post. Oh well, your blog still rocks and I'm glad that this is a porn-free site that I can read at work when I should be, you know, working.
item.content:encoded: Oops, I totally commented on this after a different post. Oh well, your blog still rocks and I’m glad that this is a porn-free site that I can read at work when I should be, you know, working.

item.title: by: marcus
item.description:
Will I am very glad to get your blog. Every time I see a new blog. I scroll to the bottom to see how long it is, and then I decide how many sessions it will take me to read it. So far I have not been able to walk away from a single one.
Thanks for taking me along on your Will Sanders China Adventure.
P.S. I think it is amazing what you are doing with the kids.
item.content:encoded:
Will I am very glad to get your blog. Every time I see a new blog. I scroll to the bottom to see how long it is, and then I decide how many sessions it will take me to read it. So far I have not been able to walk away from a single one.

Thanks for taking me along on your Will Sanders China Adventure.

P.S. I think it is amazing what you are doing with the kids.

item.title: by: Carson
item.description:
once again, amazing, Will-in-a-Chinashop. Every new entry is my new favorite.
I'm very sorry to hear about Jane, but you seem to be taking it standing up, so I won't go on about it.
And I'm very glad to hear about Jamison, which you seem to be taking falling over, so I won't go on about it.
And for the love of Mike, take care of your health. By your accounts, I wouldn't trust those Chinese doctors to tend my wounds on a battlefield in the Civil War. Have they not heard of Lister? Jesus, that's scary.
item.content:encoded:
once again, amazing, Will-in-a-Chinashop. Every new entry is my new favorite.

I’m very sorry to hear about Jane, but you seem to be taking it standing up, so I won’t go on about it.

And I’m very glad to hear about Jamison, which you seem to be taking falling over, so I won’t go on about it.

And for the love of Mike, take care of your health. By your accounts, I wouldn’t trust those Chinese doctors to tend my wounds on a battlefield in the Civil War. Have they not heard of Lister? Jesus, that’s scary.

item.title: by: Gale
item.description: Great to read another story. I still keep expecting to see you at the Dekalb Farmers Market. Sorry you got dumped, but at least we will get you back in Atlanta some day.
item.content:encoded: Great to read another story. I still keep expecting to see you at the Dekalb Farmers Market. Sorry you got dumped, but at least we will get you back in Atlanta some day.

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description:
So now you have to teach all the boys to dance and the girls to play soccer. They'll love it!
Thanks Will Sanders....what a great birthday I am having!! =)
item.content:encoded:
So now you have to teach all the boys to dance and the girls to play soccer. They’ll love it!

Thanks Will Sanders….what a great birthday I am having!! =)
